title: Test Status Tracking & Quality Infrastructure Session

issues.problem: CI failures blocking development - all checks failing unclear which are intentional vs bugs
issues.solution: Implemented intelligent test status tracking system with phase-based expected failures and enhanced pytest reporting

methods.name: Phase-Based-Test-Management
methods.description: Define explicit test expectations per development phase to distinguish intentional TDD failures from real bugs - eliminates analysis paralysis

insights.insight: Explicit state documentation eliminates ambiguity - when development state is explicitly documented developers can focus on real issues instead of analyzing every failure

timeline.description: Started session: Test Status Tracking & Quality Infrastructure Session
Resolved: CI failures blocking development - all checks fail...
Captured insight: Explicit state documentation eliminates ambiguity ...
Completed session: Successfully implemented comprehensive test status tracking system and resolved all critical CI issues. Quality infrastructure established for systematic development.

summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive test status tracking system and resolved all critical CI issues. Quality infrastructure established for systematic development.
